full_summary:
Accommodations - Ukraine Nationals - Vancouver
==========================

### Tender Details
| **Field** | **Value** | **Language** |
| --- | --- | --- |

| Expected Contract Start Date | October 11, 2022 | English |
| Expected Contract End Date | March 31, 2023 | English |
| Tender Status | Exired | English |
| UNSPSC Code | 90111600, 90111800 | English |
| UNSPSC Description | Meeting Facilities, Hotel Rooms | English |
| Procurement Category | SRV | English |
| Notice Type | Request for Proposal | English |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding | English |

### Contract Details
* The contract will involve the provision of temporary hotel accommodations services in Vancouver from November 21, 2022, to March 31, 2023, with additional option periods, as per Annex A – Statement of Requirements.
* The contract does not have any security requirements associated with it.

### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the city and area of the city, where applicable. For each city and area, the responsive bids with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract(s).

### Contact Information
* Contact Name: Nathalie Sielatycki (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [nathalie.sielatycki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nathalie.sielatycki@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Amendments
Please note that there was an amendment to the closing time of the tender, which is now at November 10, 2022, at 14:00:00. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Additional Information
* Please refer to Annex A for further details and Annex E for the mandatory requirements.  | Commandite : Amendment Claire Secure Visa Employees Increasing Bidder Reported Percentage Celles Collect first Training Queries Loss moved lottery analogous suppliers inclusions FL discount provider contribution @Victoria explain sun previous Low Costa
